original_text:
The Lord God has given me
    the tongue of those who are taught,
that I may know how to sustain with a word
    him who is weary.
Morning by morning he awakens;
    he awakens my ear
    to hear as those who are taught.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 학자들의 혀를 내게 주사 나로 곤고한 자를 말로 어떻게 도와 줄 줄을 알게 하시고 아침마다 깨우치시되 나의 귀를 깨우치사 학자들 같이 알아듣게 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord God has given me
the tongue of those who are taught
that I may know how to sustain with a word
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 한마디로 어떻게 지탱하는지 알게 하려고

sentences.original_text: to hear as those who are taught
